value: The road that leads to Prevalla. The natural beauty of Jazhince in Shterpce is pictured.

) is a skiing center 28 km from
Prevalla is a park located in Sharr Mountains, on the road from Shterpce to

, at a height of 1515 meters above sea level. The mountainous terrain, amazing landscape and fresh air make it a fantastic area for hiking, skiing and unwinding. Moreover, Lepenci River derives in this territory, which makes it even more attractive and interesting for the visitors.
Ways from which to go to Prevalla are by car and by bus. By either means, you will be able to enjoy the scenery of Sharr Mountains National Park.
You can easily reach the side of the mountain from the village center on foot. The village is small and walking is nice.

Prevalla’s Rock Peak rises above the southern side of the tourist centre and village Prevalla, reaching an altitude of 1991 metres. In maps the peak is signified in Albanian as “Guri i Prevallës”, while in Serbian you will find it as “Pavlov Kamen”. Prevalla’s Rock is easily noticeable from the beginning of Zhupa’s valley. The peak is the starting point of the river Bistrica’s pass, which is connected to the ridge of Bistra 2 peak. One of the sides of this peak separates

Bistrica river from the Lepenci river. The pass between Prevalla’s Rock to the root of Bistra 2 Peak is reached in 25 min.
Geographical coordinates:

The peak of Creviced Rock is the nearest peak to Prevalla village, located southwest from it. It is an attractive peak, especially when seen from Prevalla, from where it looks pyramid-shaped. It has an extensive northern slope, which is ideal for skiing. The peak is also connected with Konjushka Peak and one can see Prevalla from the top.
The name of the peak in the local Serbian language is

). The Serbian toponym is used in the Yugoslav maps. The origin of the peak’s name comes from a group of creviced rocks located 100 m away from the peak, which are noticeable from Prevalla. On a side note, the peak is home to the biggest herds of chamois. This peak is completely located in

territories and in the old maps its altitude is noted as 2466 m.
Coordinates:

Prevalla is good place for skiing in winter. You can find professional skiing trainers for 20 Euros an hour and you can rent snow motorcycles for 10 minutes 10 Euros and for an hour 60 Euros. The ski lift there is 200 meters long.
Its landscape and its fresh air make it a wonderful place for hikers, especially in spring and summer time.

Motel-Restaurant Eja offers food - mainly traditional Albanian dishes - that ranges from 2-5 Euros.

Motel-Restaurant Koha, near the ski lift at a high latitude, offers a wide range of food choices from 3-6 Euros.
